member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.ScriptableObjects.PolySwitchers.PolySwitchMaster.IncrementIndexByOne
member.summary: Increment current index by one. If max, reset to zero.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.ScriptableObjects.PolySwitchers.PolySwitchMaster.DecrementIndexByOne
member.summary: Decrement current index by one. If 0, reset to highest index.
